content.raw:
Pipelines failed with a boost shared ptr error coming from yaml cpp:

~~~
In file included from /usr/include/yaml-cpp/node/node.h:16:0,
                 from /usr/include/yaml-cpp/yaml.h:16,
                 from /opt/atlassian/pipelines/agent/build/src/ClientConfig.cc:18:
/usr/include/yaml-cpp/node/ptr.h:11:32: fatal error: boost/shared_ptr.hpp: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
src/CMakeFiles/ignition-fuel-tools0.dir/build.make:62: recipe for target 'src/CMakeFiles/ignition-fuel-tools0.dir/ClientConfig.cc.o' failed
make[2]: *** [src/CMakeFiles/ignition-fuel-tools0.dir/ClientConfig.cc.o] Error 1
~~~
